interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Brazilian Jerry Curly Hair Bundles, Deep Curly Virgin Human Hair 3 Bundles, Brazilian Cheap Jerry Curls Weave, 9A Unprocessed Kinky Curly Hair Extension for Black Women (14''16''18''+ 14''closure)
Review Date: 2022/11/18
Store: Zigmoon hair
Product Description: ['Promotion Season and New Year Promotion. Choose Zigmoon Hair, Dance in The Moonlight with Me', 'Jerry Curly Human Hair Bundles', '-Brand Name: Zigmoon hair-Hair Material: 100% Brazilian virgin human hair-Hair Texture: Brazilian Jerry curly hair weave 3 bundles with lace closure-Hair Color: natural black color-Hair Length: multiple choices, 10inch-24inch in stock-Hair Weight: 100gram/bundle-Hair Quality: tangle free, can be dyed and straightened, soft Brazilian kinky curly hair extension-Processing: no chemical processing, no weird Smell, healthy and glossy.', 'Brazilian Jerry Curly 4*4 Free Part Closure', '-Lace Material: Swiss lace, invisible and durable.-Lace Color: medium brown color-Closure Length: 12inch-18inch in stock-Closure Weight: 30gram-45gram/PieceHair Density: 130% full density.-Lace Part: free part lace closure with baby hair-Made Method: 100% hand-tied, natural looking', 'Q1. 100% Human Hair?', 'Yes, Zigmoon hair is 100% virgin human hair. Testing by burning--human hair will show white smoke and turn to ash; synthetic hair will show black smoke and be a sticky ball after burning.', 'Q2. How long it last?', 'Customers told us that it can last 7-15 months with hair care tips. Please wash the hair with conditioner twice a week.', 'Q3. Does this hair have smell?', 'It may have local shampoo smell on it, but the smell will disappear after co-wash.', 'Q4. Can the hair be dyed?', 'Yes, our hair has good quality, so you can dyed it into any colors, but it’s easier to darken the hair than to lighten it. You can also go to hair Salon']
Average Rating: 4.7

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Commitment to Quality:** The user remains dedicated to high-quality, natural human hair products and has reaffirmed this commitment through a recent purchase of premium virgin human hair. Their previous negative experience with a synthetic product has heightened their focus on authenticity.

- **Diverse Style Exploration:** The user's adventurous approach to hairstyles persists, but their recent purchase reflects a cautious mindset, as they are now more selective about product choices to ensure quality and satisfaction.

- **Adaptability in Hair Length:** They continue to embrace flexibility in hair lengths, with a preference for styles that easily integrate into their daily routines, maintaining a focus on high-quality extensions.

- **Experience Management:** The user’s disappointment with synthetic hair has led them to prioritize brands that demonstrate strong quality assurance, influencing their loyalty to trustworthy vendors.

- **Color and Style Preferences:** While the user favors natural shades, they are likely to approach color selection with a newfound scrutiny, particularly when considering unfamiliar brands.

- **Loyalty to Trusted Vendors:** Strengthened by a commitment to quality, the user has turned to established brands that prioritize authentic materials, reinforcing their long-term loyalty.

- **Accessory Engagement:** They continue to seek out high-quality hair accessories that complement their hairstyles, reflecting their holistic aesthetic sensibility.

In summary, the user’s dedication to premium, authentic hair products is evident, along with a reinforced approach to selecting vendors based on quality assurance while remaining adventurous in their styling choices.
